NAME: Spoiler
AUTHOR: FlapJack
DESCRIPTION:
Hide spoilers using animated GIFs. Users need to mouseover the image to see the spoiler. Does not work on Android!

Dependencies:
Pillow :: https://python-pillow.org/
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing FlapJack's Spoiler cog. Note that the GIFs may not work correctly on some mobile devices!
